item.title: Research
item.description: Physics-based machine learning for geophysical inversion Stochastic inversion, uncertainty estimation and joint-inversion Your browser does not support the video tag. Large-scale 3D magnetotelluric modelling & inversion D-Rex, funded by ERA-MIN2 under Horizon 2020, has concluded its work and is now in the reporting phase. The project advanced the understanding of mineral systems through geophysical data from Sweden, Norway, and Finland, integrating it into a unified Common Earth Model (CEM). Key efforts included electromagnetic surveys, 3D modeling, and machine learning techniques.
